note:
⭐ SEC.gov EDGAR scanner for new 8-K 1.05 'Material Cybersecurity Incident' filings
⭐ Run by @cityhallin

📝Note: this account mainly posts about 1.05 'Material Cybersecurity Incident' filings at the moment. Organizations sometimes create 8.01 'Other Event' filings at first detection of a cyber security event. Only if the event is deemed to impact the organization at a "material" level, they will file a 1.05. 8.01 scanning currently being investigated.
Some broad with a mastodon account. Harbinger of K8s Deprecations. Staff Developer Advocate @ Pulumi. She/they.

Hacker, public servant, researcher, executive, ( Chairperson of Cyber-ITL a 501(c)3 non-profit )

Don't do it for money, do it to make a difference.

I write build tooling these days and still enjoy making developer's lives easier. I spent 21 years at Sun Microsystems, Inc, working on and around Solaris, and then a while at Joyent.

I do miss the old days a bit, but rose-tinted glasses and all that... I now use FreeBSD on my personal systems where I can. I have many hobbies, one of which is keeping my old Series Land Rover running.

Co. Down, Northern Ireland
